casebody.data:
Polly Groome STRICKLAND, Carroll P. Groome, Mary Elizabeth Groome McHenry, and John R. Groome, Jr.
v.
Bill LAWRENCE, Lawrence Sand and Gravel, Inc., d/b/a Viewmont Sandrock, Inc., Viewmont Sandrock, David H. Griffin, Sr., Jimmy Clark, Bishop Road Properties, LLC and Viewmont Road Properties, LLC. No. 224P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 24, 2006. Teresa DeLoatch Bryant, Greensboro, for Strickland, et al. Andrew S. Lasine, High Point, for Griffin, Clark and Viewmont Rd. James W. Miles, Jr., William A. Eagles, Greensboro, for Lawrence, Lawrence Sand, et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 25th day of April 2006 by Plaintiffs in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th day of June 2006."
